pages.text: $(#0BE334)Item Added In Simply More$(br2)$()A simplistic weapon tacked together from hand-shaped rocks, seemingly just a rocky mace with spikes jutting out from all sides; clumsily made. You can feel the heat from within, pure embroiled rage emanating from the weaponâ€™s core, much like the chieftain

who once wielded the weapon. Their influence still remains inside the peaks of this primal weapon, burning brightly as it wars within. A form of shamanic energy dances around the strike-end of the weapon, an archaic form of magic mastered by very few.
